item.title: Tropical disturbance being watched near Florida
item.description: A new area of concern located near the SE coast of Florida is starting to show up on some forecast models.

item.title: Bending the Arc: Students experience history on spring beak
Man rescued after boat capsizes near Sunshine Skyway Bridge
item.description: No injuries were reported and recovery of the man’s boat was in progress.

item.title: Charter expansions jeopardize Sarasota’s Wilkinson Elementary, others could be next
item.description: A review of state data found that 20 Sarasota schools have steadily lost students.

item.title: New ferry stops may be coming to Manatee County
item.description: New stops may include Coquina South and two in Palmetto.

item.title: Dingler, Pérez lead Tigers past Guardians 6-3 and into division series against Mariners
item.description: It is the second straight season the Tigers have won a Wild Card Series on the road

item.title: Cubs beat Padres 3-1 to clinch wild card, advance to series against the Brewers
item.description: Next up for Chicago is a matchup with Milwaukee beginning with Game 1 on Saturday.

item.title: Breezy winds continue to drive showers into the Suncoast
WATCH LIVE: Gov. Ron DeSantis is LIVE in Clearwater
Trump sets Sunday deadline for Hamas to agree to a deal for ending the war in Gaza
item.description: President Donald Trump says Hamas must agree to a proposed peace deal for Gaza by Sunday evening Eastern time and threatens the group will face more attacks if it doesn't.

item.title: Charlotte County Sheriff’s Office “sweeping the streets” to combat drug distribution
item.description: “Addiction is a disease, and I want to again remind our community that we have a program for those who are ready”

item.title: Fire Crews Team Up To Smother Barn Fire
item.description: Due to the rapid teamwork of both crews, there are no injuries reported.
